replies.msg: 屌你呀 咁同推人落火坑有咩分別

My friend Fuyuki has opened a gym that opens twenty four hours a day. So far it's been a great success. The outstanding quality gym and shower equipment is a crucial factor in the success of the gym. Of course the excellent customer service also plays a key role in the company's success. He asked me if I could find a good manager for him I said "I can't make any promises but I'll see what I can do" My friend Fumi has an interview for a marketing director position in his gym. Fuyuki laid heavy stress on the importance of leadership qualities. He also stressed that clear communication is a decisive factor in the outcome of the interview. The interview stresses her out. I said "try not to stress too much about it. Rest easy. Just put your mind at ease" My brother too said "Don't stress yourself too much. Set your mind at rest. Don't stress over it." My cousin also said "don't stress yourself out. Put your mind at rest" She quit her previous job because her colleagues always bullied her and the salary was low. I said "I don't blame you for wanting to leave" Last tuesday we had supper at Fumi's place. Her elder brother hot Japanese homework to do. He said "I've got to do part A but I don't have to part B" I said "I'll leave you doing your homework" He soaks up new vocabularies and grammar patterns very quickly. During the classes he soaks up everything the teacher says. When "Fushima" is a Japanese word you should stress the second third and last syllables. But when it's an english word the stress is only on the third syllable. When he reads a novel he's like a sponge and soaks up the story. If he encounters computer problems he'll find jess egos an expert and soak the advice up she offers. Fumi's elder brother has harp exam the week after. He said "after this exam I'll do grade eight next year or better still I'll directly take the diploma exam" After chatting with him in his room for a while I said "I'll leave you do get on with it."My brother said "I'd better leave you to practise your exam pieces" My cousin said "I had better leave you to get on with your practice" Some milk and apple juice spilt down the chair onto the floor so Fumi soaked it up with a dishcloth. Her eldest brother went to meditate in his room after supper so I left hom to himself. Her elder and younger sisters Judy and jane booked a massage session. Judy asked "had I better leave my wallet on the nightstand?"June too asked "should we leave our valuables on the night table?" I said "you'd better not leave your valuables on the bedside table during your massage session as someone might steal it" My cousin asked "hadn't you better leave your wallet in your locker so that it's safe?" My brother too said "shouldn't you leave tour valuables there?" Fumi's eldest sister has a job interview tomorrow. I said "I'm rooting for you. I'm there for you. It's gonna be ok. You got this"My cousin said "I support you. I've got your back" Her boyfriend has geography exams at university next month so hes occupied with revision. I said "you're almost there. I believe in you. You got this" When his professor was tutoring him he said "that's coming along nicely. Keep up the good work. You're learning fast. You're getting better every day. You've almost mastered that" His tutor also said "now you've got the hang of it. You're on the right track now.You're doing fine. Keep it up." Recently Fuyuki shouted at his sister and called her a liar because of a misunderstanding. I said "I can't believe you said that to her" My cousin too said "I can't believe you would say that to her" He'll be throwing a birthday party next Tuesday but alas I can't make it because I got work to do.When he invited me ar first I said "we'll have to see" He's making the most elaborate preparations for his party. Janet is assisting with the party preparation.John is assisting in making preparations for the party top. Fuyuki and his friends are sharing the preparation between themselves so it isn't too much work.

My friend Fuyuki is a CEO of 24 Fitness in central. The membership is three hundred and eighty eight dollars per month which is well worth it for the broad range of facilities you can use. My friend's husband asked him "how are the party preparations going?" Happy birthday Fuyuki. I'm sure your family and friends will join me in wishing you a very happy birthday. Last year he got a king size bed frame and mattress for my birthday. I remember I said "I can't believe you got me a king size bed frame and mattress" They didn't come cheap. Charles has got a commission for an article on picasso from an art magazine. He's doing research in preparation for the article. His girlfriend is assisting in the preparation of the research as well. His favourite NBA team Lakers will be playing against Bulls in the playoff season next month. Playoff games like this require proper preparation. The poster and the promo video are in preparation. The players in Lakers are doing careful preparation for it as they didn't perform well in their last two games because they did no preparation. The players in Bulls didn't seem to have done much preparation for their last three games as well. Bulls almost lost them so this time they're doing thorough preparation for it including stealing, dunking, getting rebounds, blocking, free throw shooting and three point shooting as well as cardiovascular training. Training six hours a day is ideal preparation for the playoff season. You cannot play against a high level team without adequate preparation. Paul is making preparations for his ski trip to Osaka. Hes also making 0reparstions to meet his favourite band X Japan in tokyo. So hes preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made  for next month's ski festival in osaka. The organizations who organize the ski festival have announced that preparations for it are well under way. Paul's favourite fighter Dan will be fighting John for the heavyweight title in August. Championships like this need adequate preparation. The promo video is in preparation. Dan is doing thorough preparation for the fight as he didn't perform well in his last fight because he did very little preparation. John disnt seem to have done much preparation for his last fight too. He almost lost it so this time he's doing meticulous preparation for it including kickboxing, wrestling and judo as well as cardio training. Sparring regularly is good preparation for a fight. You cannot fight a high level fighter without adequate preparation. By the way about seventy one percent of the earth's surface is covered by water. On Mars, twenty percent of its atmosphere is covered by carbon dioxide while three percent of it is covered with carbon monoxide. Paul's new table and chairs are covered by plastic sheeting. His new television is covered with protective plastic wrappings.
